item.title: The Lost Colony of Macro-freeholders
item.description: enterprise loves a vaccuum. THE LOST COLONY OF MACRO-FREEHOLDERS mixed by SLY download the "lost colony of macro-freeholders" mix by sly here! TRACKLISTING: Deadbeats "Funky For You (Spacehopper Remix)" Wiseguys "Au Pair Girls" Jeep Beat Collective "Funky For You" Tommy Tee "Aerosoul" Cut Chemist "Lesson 6: The Lecture" Z-Trip "Further Explorations In The Black Hole" Dj Shadow "Stem (Cops N' Robbers Remix)" Dj Q-Bert "Cosmic Assassins" Handsome Boy Modeling School "Rock ‘N Roll" Hive "Ultrasonic Sound" We "Chango" Unkle "Celestial Annihilation" Ryiuchi Sakamoto "Anger (Rare Force 2 Meg Remix)" Propellerheads "A Number Of Microphones" The Chemical Brothers "Playground Of A Wedgeless Firm" Coldcut "More Beats N' Pieces (Dj Lord Fader Turntable Remix)" homebase of sly thunder's lair twitter facebook youtube flickr

item.title: the scorpions of regret
item.description: THE SCORPIONS OF REGRET mixed by SLY dj y (alias jy) "torchburners" go home productions "easy divide " dj fac " chase dem up" jurassic 5 "gotta understand (grant phabao remix)" wu-tang clan vs. the beatles "the movement" rhythm scholar "baby, you're flying" wu-tang clan vs. the beatles "got your money" adrian champion "cash run" wu-tang clan vs the beatles "release yo self" urban dance squad "deeper shade of soul (dj zebra rework)" vic "can't stop rock n' roll" voicedude "balloons for the boss" james gang "funk #97 (geezy's math remix)" faroff "fafafa my car" lyrics born "hello (dj erb remix)" the rolling stones "gimme shelter (illuminoids remix)" epmd "chill (unscrewed remix)" g3rst "uptight swoon" dj peaking "stardust sounds better with pj harvey" dolly parton "jolene (dj soap remix)" the animals "gloria (murge comp d remix)" colatron "don't fear the anthem" www.sly-3.blogspot.com www.sly.podomatic.com www.twitter.com/sly_3 www.facebook.com/donkeyWranglerToTheStars www.sly-3.tumblr.com
item.dc:creator: sly

item.title: The Golden Hammer of Infinite Revolutions
item.description: THE GOLDEN HAMMER OF INFINITE REVOLUTIONS mixed by sly I live in the ancient nightmare world, a world of square roots of minus one. TRACKLISTING: freelance hellraiser "remomg!wtf!" colatron "breathing irregularity" loo & placido "safari love" mash mike "ride a burning pony" alicia keys f/ jay-z "empire state of mind (big apple remix)" solcofn "astounded saliva" bogoss "don't look back at you" bogoss "i need a dollar family" missy elliot vs. martin brew "work it (hopscotch remix)" dj frogg "flushy groove" beastie boys "so watcha want (dj eleven remix)" colatron "steppin out on the town" phat bastard "ain't no frontiin" amoraboy "there, just the way i'll be" chali 2na vs amerie "cut chemist suite (take control remix)" lock3down "hercules on parade" dj zebra "hard to pay back" michmash "tell me como va" dj schmolli "rock wit the original waterpumpee" michael jackson "rockin' robin (grant phabao remix)" draman "woo ha! i lost my sombrero" charles wright & the 103rd st. band "express yourself (yum yum remix)" www.sly-3.blogspot.com www.sly-3.tumblr.com www.twitter.com/sly_3 www.facebook.com/donkeywranglertothestars www.sly.podomatic.com

item.title: The Method of Moments
item.description: THE METHOD OF MOMENTS mixed by SLY every shadow, no matter how deep, is threatened by the morning light. download "the method of moments" mix here! "THE METHOD OF MOMENTS" TRACKLISTING: dj lobsterdust "say it ain't hello" gara gara "redub" fissunix "bad moon hustling" marc johnce "staying on the edge" mighty mike "nothin' ironic" ccc "don't wanna leave her now" mighty mike "use the same old song" the pixies "where is my mind (bassnectar mix)" totom "new harry" gaston "always superstition" fissunix "burn da funk" ryan nellis "the who train" party ben "machine gun shelter" dj y (alias jy) vs. amoraboy "beg it again" mad mix mustang "is this digital love?" solcofn "g-love" dj zebra "with a little help from soulwax" missy elliot "let it bump (hydroz mix)" dj prince "blow your head & beat dis" dj le clown "get drunk" thc "beat it to the super crystal lightning" thunder's lair donkey wrangler to the stars podcast donkey wrangler to the stars @ facebook sly @ youtube sly @ vimeo

item.title: now, they are animals...
item.description: NOW, THEY ARE ANIMALS mixed by SLY They are so placid and self-contained. They do not lie awake in the dark and weep for their sins. Not one of them kneels to another or to his own kind that lived thousands of years ago. Not one of them is unhappy, all over the earth. download "now, they are animals..." mix here! "NOW, THEY ARE ANIMALS" TRACKLISTING: amoraboy "my baby just cares for my love" mighty mike "for no bop" gaston "ulysses shaped box" voicedude "four twenty '09" team 9 "no woman no wild" beck "where it's at (mike simpson mix)" dj clive$ter "new york bodega" lobsterdust "brooklyn rocks" overdub "mixed farm" prime mover "robot pigs" totom "freight train control" dj schmolli "in-a-gadda blue monday" markyboy "you've got another white wedding" faroff "enter day tripper" voicedude "twist on fire" aggro 1 "everlong knife" lenny kravitz "let love rule (justice mix)" dj m.i.f. "da ritz street bomb" dj moule "dance like a virgin" thunder's lair donkey wrangler to the stars podcast donkey wrangler to the stars @ facebook sly @ youtube sly @ vimeo
item.dc:creator: sly
